# PLAYER::SET_PLAYER_STEALTH_PERCEPTION_MODIFIER

## Summary
Modify how easy AI can see the player when stealthed

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player
* **FLOAT** stealthPerceptionModifier

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Modify how easy AI can see the player when stealthed
